hadiths.text: Abdullah b. 'Umar reported that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:When any one of you prays, he should not allow anyone to pass before him, and if he refuses, he should be then forcibly resisted, for there is a devil with him

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْعِ الْمَارِّ بَيْنَ يَدَىِ الْمُصَلِّي
chapter.eng-name: Preventing One Who Wants To Pass In Front Of A Praying Person
